nodes.text: Doctor Gatten Edaine was a male Human who worked with the Galactic Republic during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Edaine, along with Laria Taphoni and Tal, was stationed on Taris and worked for the Taris Resettlement Initiative. He participated in the expedition that was assigned to work with Jedi Master Cin Tykan to investigate the desolated swampland populated by rakghouls. However, most members of the expedition were killed. Edaine was a member of a survey team, who had left along with Tykan before the attack.
